Photography: I would choose to master photography because it is a versatile and visually stunning art form that allows me to capture the world around me inent new ways. It would also allow me to express my creativity and share my perspective with others.

Cooking: I would choose to master cooking because it is a practical and enjoyable skill that would allow me to create delicious meals and desserts for myself and others. It would also allow me to explore different cuisines and cultures through food.

Music: I would choose to master music because it is a universal language that has the power to evoke emotions and connect people. It would allow me to express myself through different genres and styles of music and create my own compositions.

Writing: I would choose to master writing because it is a powerful tool for communication and expression. It would allow me to share my thoughts, ideas, and stories with others and potentially make a positive impact on the world.

Programming: I would choose to master programming because it is a valuable skill in today's digital world. It would allow me to create and solve complex problems, automate tasks, and build innovative solutions. Additionally, it would give me the ability to work in a variety of industries and create my own business.
